Dive into a mix of genres and sonic experiments blending live performance, pre-produced tracks, live-looping, and on-the-go music creation. With a programmed light show enhancing the performance, Sumesh's unique percussion setup, combining the cajon and mridangam, takes center stage, showcasing his 25+ years of musical prowess. Explore his eclectic influences from classical to experimental on Spotify.

name: Chandan Shetty Live in Bangalore
about: Chandan Shetty, also known as "Kannada Rapper Chandan Shetty", is an Indian film score and soundtrack composer, lyricist, and singer known for his work in the Kannada language. He gained popularity for his music in movies like Alemari, Varadanayaka, Power, Chakravyuha, and Bhajarangi. Chandan Shetty also emerged as the winner of Bigg Boss Kannada Season 5, showcasing his talent and strong presence in the industry.
